name: v3 Code System QueryRequestLimit
description: Definition: Defines the units associated with the magnitude of the maximum size limit of a query response that can be accepted by the requesting application.

property.description: Indicates that the code is abstract - only intended to be used as a selector for other concepts

concept.definition: Definition: The number of matching instances (number of focal classes). The document header class is the focal class of a document, a record would therefore be equal to a document.
Definition: The number of matching instances (number of focal classes). The document header class is the focal class of a document, a record would therefore be equal to a document.
